content.rendered:
#36daysoftype #36days_a #typography #experiment #ableton #elasticdrums

A post shared by James Stiff (@jamesstiff) on Feb 21, 2017 at 10:55am PST

I'm participating in 36 Days of Type again this year. 36 days, a different letter or number each day. Follow my progress over on Instagram if you like barely legible typefaces, repetition, amateur beats and Speak & Spell vocals.

Follow my progress over on Instagram if you like barely legible typefaces, repetition, amateur beats and Speak […]
